posts.title: March 2012 Update
posts.summary:
Dear friends, family, and fellow believers,

	Greetings in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.  We wanted to give you an update on our last trip to Haiti.  We were in Haiti during the month of February and March.  My husband was with ...

posts.title: September 2011 Trip Update
posts.summary: On September 7th I traveled to Haiti with the expectation that our rented house would be ready, and that we would be able to take in children.  We have several children who are currently living in the mountains that are potential candidates fo...

posts.title: Introduction to God So Loved The World Ministries
posts.summary: My name is Evangelist Arlene Bailey; I am writing this to share the vision God has placed on my heart.  We are believing God to start an orphanage in Haiti.  The name we have chosen for the ministry is God So Loved The World Ministries (J...
